items.title: DeepSeek Unveils DeepSeek-Prover-V2: Advancing Neural Theorem Proving with Recursive Proof Search and a New Benchmark
items.excerpt: DeepSeek AI has announced the release of DeepSeek-Prover-V2, a groundbreaking open-source large language model specifically designed for formal theorem proving within the Lean 4 environment. This latest iteration builds upon previous work by introducing an innovative recursive…

items.title: Can GRPO be 10x Efficient? Kwai AI’s SRPO Suggests Yes with SRPO
items.excerpt: The remarkable success of OpenAI’s o1 series and DeepSeek-R1 has unequivocally demonstrated the power of large-scale reinforcement learning (RL) in eliciting sophisticated reasoning behaviors and significantly enhancing the capabilities of large language models (LLMs).

items.title: Zhipu.AI’s Open-Source Power Play: Blazing-Fast GLM Models & Global Expansion Ahead of Potential IPO

items.title: DeepSeek Signals Next-Gen R2 Model, Unveils Novel Approach to Scaling Inference with SPCT
items.excerpt: DeepSeek AI, a prominent player in the large language model arena, has recently published a research paper detailing a new technique aimed at enhancing the scalability of general reward models (GRMs) during the inference phase. Simultaneously, the company has hinted at the imm…
